name: UNMECHANIZE
description:
Unmechanize is a classic shoot-em-up in a cyberpunk universe.

THE STORY :

The robots took control of the cities and manage the whole society only thinking about the common good. In order to optimize everything they took humanity's freedom. A group of crazy rebels decide to take up arms to free themselves and Unmechanize their city !

THE CHARACTERS : (not translated yet)

CONTROLS :

ZQSD : Move

Left click : Shoot

Right click : Ultimate shoot

Space : Change Character

(you can also use a controller)
